item.title: 日本首相竞争者兼内阁官房长官林：日本央行的货币政策与政府的想法偏差不大
item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: 欧洲和中东紧张局势加剧，石油价格上涨
item.description: 受欧洲和中东地缘政治紧张局势的支撑，油价周一小幅上扬，但更多石油供应的前景以及贸易关税对全球燃料需求影响的担忧也拖累了油价。【原文：Oil prices inched up on Monday supported by geopolitical tension in Europe and the Middle East, although the prospect of more oil supply and concern about the impact of trade tariffs on global fuel demand weighed.】

item.title: 日本首相竞选者林支持日本央行加息策略
item.description: 日本政府最高发言人、下届首相候选人林芳正告诉路透社，日本央行逐步提高利率的计划与政府的经济政策思路基本一致。【原文：The Bank of Japan's plan to gradually raise interest rates is broadly in line with the government's thinking on economic policy, Yoshimasa Hayashi, top government spokesperson and a contender to become next prime minister, told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国 9 月连续第四个月维持基准贷款利率不变
item.description: 9 月份，中国连续第四个月保持基准贷款利率不变，符合市场预期。【原文：China kept benchmark lending rates unchanged for the fourth consecutive month in September, in line with market expectations.】

item.title: 更多参议院共和党人对联邦通信委员会向迪士尼施压表示担忧
item.description: 共和党参议员兰德-保罗（Rand Paul）周日表示，联邦通信委员会主席布兰登-卡尔（Brendan Carr）威胁迪士尼和地方广播公司播放 "吉米-基梅尔现场直播 "节目是 "绝对不恰当的"。【原文：Republican Senator Rand Paul said on Sunday that threats by Federal Communications Commission chair Brendan Carr against Disney and local broadcasters for airing "Jimmy Kimmel Live" were "absolutely inappropriate."】

item.title: Stellantis 检测到北美客户的第三方供应商存在漏洞
item.description: Stellantis 在周日的一份声明中说，该公司检测到对第三方服务提供商平台的未经授权访问，该平台支持其北美客户服务业务。【原文：Stellantis detected unauthorized access to a third-party service provider's platform that supports its North American customer service operations, the company said in a statement on Sunday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，萨克斯全球公司（Saks Global）正在洽谈以约 10 亿美元的价格出售波道夫-古德曼（Bergdorf Goodman）49% 的股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士的话报道，萨克斯第五大道百货公司（Saks Fifth Avenue）的母公司萨克斯全球公司（Saks Global）正在洽谈以约 10 亿美元的价格出售奢侈品零售商波道夫-古德曼（Bergdorf Goodman）49% 的股份。【原文：Saks Global, the parent of Saks Fifth Avenue, is in talks to sell a 49% stake in luxury retailer Bergdorf Goodman for about $1 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道韩国总统李明博称美国的投资要求将引发金融危机
item.description: 韩国总统李在明（Lee Jae Myung）告诉路透社记者，如果政府在没有保障措施的情况下接受美国目前在陷入僵局的贸易谈判中提出的要求，韩国经济可能会陷入与 1997 年金融危机时相媲美的危机。【原文：South Korea's economy could fall into crisis rivalling its 1997 meltdown if the government accepts current U.S. demands in stalled trade talks without safeguards, President Lee Jae Myung told Reuters.】

item.title: 特德-克鲁兹敦促特朗普支持提高飞行员退休年龄，工人团体反对
item.description: 国际规则禁止 65 岁以上的飞行员执飞国际航班，包括美国在内的许多国家在国内也适用同样的规则。【原文：International rules prohibit airline pilots older than 65 from flying international flights, and many countries, including the United States, apply the same rule domestically as well.】

item.title: 特朗普对 H-1B 签证的打压颠覆了印度 IT 行业的游戏规则
item.description: 据技术资深人士、分析师、律师和经济学家称，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）从周日起对新的 H-1B 签证征收 10 万美元费用后，印度价值 2830 亿美元的信息技术部门将不得不彻底改变其数十年来向美国项目轮调技术人才的战略。【原文：India's $283 billion information technology sector will have to overhaul its decades-old strategy of rotating skilled talent into U.S. projects following U.S. President Donald Trump's move to impose a $100,000 fee for new H-1B visas from Sunday, according to tech veterans, analysts, lawyers and economists.】

item.title: 黑客攻击中断后，欧洲机场争分夺秒修复值机故障
item.description: 欧洲一些最大的机场，包括该地区最繁忙的希思罗机场，在前一天因黑客攻击而中断运行后，周日纷纷恢复了自动值机系统的正常运行。【原文：Some of Europe's biggest airports, including the region's busiest Heathrow, raced on Sunday to restore normal operations to automatic check-in systems after disruption caused by hackers a day earlier.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Optus 将紧急电话中断归咎于偏离 "既定流程
item.description: 澳大利亚第二大电信运营商 Optus 周日表示，网络升级过程中偏离常规流程引发了技术故障，导致紧急呼叫服务中断 13 个小时，并与四人死亡有关。【原文：Optus, Australia's No. 2 telecom carrier, said on Sunday that a departure from regular processes on a network upgrade sparked a technical failure that disrupted emergency call services for 13 hours and has been linked to four deaths.】

item.title: 速度与激情特朗普命令引发失望和混乱，海外H-1B工人竞相涌入美国
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）大范围打击移民活动，征收新的签证费，印度和中国持有H-1B签证的工人被迫放弃旅行计划，匆忙返回美国。【原文：Panic, confusion, and anger reigned as workers on H-1B visas from India and China were forced to abandon travel plans and rush back to the U.S. after President Donald Trump imposed new visa fees, in line with his wide-ranging immigration crackdown.】

item.title: 新世界后裔郑志刚成立公司，瞄准数字空间和新兴市场
item.description: 香港最富有家族之一的郑志刚（Adrian Cheng）一年前卸任大型开发商新世界发展（New World Development）首席执行官一职，并于周日成立了一家新公司，专注于数字领域和新兴市场。【原文：Hong Kong's Adrian Cheng, scion of one of the city's richest families and who stepped down a year ago as CEO of major developer New World Development , launched a new firm on Sunday focusing on the digital space and emerging markets.】

item.title: 达拉斯机场恢复正常，美国联邦航空局详述造成故障的问题
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局详述了威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications）旗下一个部门的电信故障导致 2000 多架次航班中断的情况，达拉斯地区两个机场的航班运营于周六恢复正常。【原文：Flight operations at two Dallas-area airports returned to normal operations on Saturday as the Federal Aviation Administration detailed telecom failures by a unit of Verizon Communications that it said led to more than 2,000 flight disruptions.】

item.title: 白宫表示，美国新的 H-1B 签证费用将不适用于现有持有者
item.description: "这是一次性费用"。【原文："This is a one-time fee."】

item.title: 新款 iPhone 17 在莫斯科亮相，尽管经济放缓，但预售量仍大幅攀升
item.description: 俄罗斯经销商周六在店内发布了苹果公司的新款 iPhone 17，主要零售商 Restore: 报告称今年的预购量急剧上升。【原文：Russian resellers unveiled Apple's new iPhone 17 in stores on Saturday, as major retailer Restore: reported a sharp rise in pre-ordering this year.】

item.title: 印度称特朗普提高 H-1B 签证费可能扰乱家庭生活
item.description: 印度周六表示，特朗普政府将美国H-1B签证费提高至每年10万美元的举措很可能会造成人道主义后果，并警告说可能会对家庭造成干扰。【原文：India said on Saturday that the Trump administration’s move to increase U.S. H-1B visa fees to $100,000 per year was likely to have humanitarian consequences, warning of potential disruptions for families.】

item.title: 白宫表示，TikTok 美国业务的 7 个董事会席位中，美国人占了 6 席
item.description: 白宫新闻秘书卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）周六表示，华盛顿和中国政府就 TikTok 的未来达成的协议将包括美国人在监督该短视频应用在美国运营的董事会的七个席位中占据六个席位。【原文：A deal between Washington and Beijing on the future of TikTok will include Americans holding six of seven seats of a board overseeing the short video app's U.S. operations, White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said on Saturday.】

item.title: 印度外长戈亚尔将于9月22日访美进行贸易谈判
item.description: 印度商工部周六表示，印度商务部长皮尤什-戈亚尔（Piyush Goyal）将于 9 月 22 日访问美国，进行贸易谈判。【原文：Indian Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal will visit the United States on September 22 for trade talks, India's Ministry of Commerce and Industry said on Saturday.】

item.title: 加拿大财政部长表示："加拿大将密切关注泰克-安格鲁公司的交易
item.description: 加拿大财政部长弗朗索瓦-菲利普-香槟（Francois Philippe Champagne）周六表示，加拿大联邦政府正在审查泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）和英美资源公司（Anglo American）拟议中的 530 亿美元合并案，联邦政府必须确保该合并案符合国家的净利益。【原文：The proposed $53 billion merger between Teck Resources and Anglo American is under review by Canada's federal government, which must make sure it is in the net benefit of the country, Finance Minister Francois Philippe Champagne said on Saturday.】

item.title: 行业组织称，新的美国 H-1B 签证费可能会扰乱印度的 IT 业务
item.description: 代表印度 2,830 亿美元 IT 和业务流程外包产业的 Nasscom 表示，新政策的最后期限只有一天，这给 "世界各地的企业、专业人士和学生带来了相当大的不确定性"。【原文：Nasscom, representing India’s $283 billion IT and business process outsourcing industry said, the one-day deadline for the new policy created "considerable uncertainty for businesses, professionals, and students across the world."】

item.title: 迪斯尼暂停基梅尔的职务表明特朗普对媒体的控制越来越强
item.description: 美国广播公司（ABC）在联邦通信委员会的压力下突然停播脱口秀主持人吉米-金梅尔（Jimmy Kimmel）的节目，是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）利用政治压力压制批评和惩罚他认为对自己有偏见的机构，从而使媒体、娱乐和数字平台屈从于他的意志的权力的最新体现。【原文：ABC's abrupt suspension of talk show host Jimmy Kimmel under pressure from the Federal Communications Commission is the latest demonstration of the power President Donald Trump wields to bend media, entertainment and digital platforms to his will, as he uses political pressure to mute criticism and punish institutions he sees as biased against him.】

item.title: 诺华首席执行官表示，诺华的库存足以抵御特朗普可能征收的关税
item.description: 诺华公司首席执行官在上周六发表的一篇访谈中表示，该公司已增加了在美国的药品库存，并已做好充分准备，以防其产品受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税的冲击。【原文：Novartis has increased its stockpiles of pharmaceuticals in the United States and is well prepared should its products be hit by President Donald Trump's tariffs, its chief executive said in an interview published on Saturday.】

item.title: 中国敦促美国确保为 TikTok 和其他中国公司提供公平的商业环境
item.description: 中国商务部周六表示，希望美国为包括 TikTok 在内的中国公司继续在美国开展业务提供开放、公平和非歧视的商业环境。【原文：China's commerce ministry said on Saturday it hopes the United States will provide an open, fair and non-discriminatory business environment for Chinese companies to continue operating in the U.S., including TikTok.】

item.title: 中国互联网监管机构就违规内容向酷狗和微博发出警告
item.description: 中国互联网监管机构周六表示，已指示北京分公司对直播平台酷开科技和社交媒体公司微博采取惩戒措施。【原文：China's internet regulator said on Saturday it has directed its Beijing branch to impose disciplinary measures on livestreaming platform Kuaishou Technology and social media company Weibo .】

item.title: 紧急呼叫服务中断引发众怒，澳大利亚 Optus 公司誓言配合调查
item.description: 澳大利亚第二大电信运营商 Optus 周六表示，将配合官方调查，此前有三人因技术故障死亡，紧急呼叫服务中断了 13 个小时。【原文：Optus, Australia's No. 2 telecom carrier, said on Saturday it would cooperate with official investigations after three people died following a technical failure that disrupted emergency call services for 13 hours.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，电动汽车制造商 Polestar 因后视摄像头问题召回逾 2.7 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周六表示，由于后视摄像头问题，电动汽车制造商Polestar将在美国召回27816辆汽车。【原文：Electric vehicle maker Polestar is recalling 27,816 cars in the United States due to a rearview camera issue, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Saturday.】

item.title: 网络攻击导致希思罗、布鲁塞尔等欧洲机场航班中断
item.description: 一家登机手续办理和登机系统服务供应商遭到网络攻击，导致包括伦敦希思罗机场、布鲁塞尔机场和柏林机场在内的几家欧洲主要机场运营中断，造成航班延误和取消。【原文：A cyberattack targeting a service provider for check-in and boarding systems has disrupted operations at several major European airports including London's Heathrow, Brussels and Berlin, causing flight delays and cancellations, the operators said.】

item.title: 两个机器人出租车集团为新加坡提供服务
item.description: 两家中国公司周六表示，它们将与本地公司合作，在新加坡推出机器人出租车服务，因为新加坡正在向自动驾驶领域拓展。【原文：Two Chinese companies said on Saturday they will partner with local firms to launch robotaxi services in Singapore, as the city-state expands into autonomous driving.】
